data.text: “Egh nɨ uan averpenim asamimɨn danganir mɨtaghniam a gisɨfagh,
Guizbangɨra, nɨn nguazim aruegh bar ekevegh,
“Gumazir nɨn ingarizim, a nɨn pamɨn mɨn iti.
“Guizbangɨra Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze, kɨ nɨn diaghtɨ nɨ uam na bagh izam.
“Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨn Akurvazir Gumazim, kɨ ghaze,
“Kɨ fomɨra Noa ko akam akɨra ghaze,
Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn bar ia gifongezim, kɨ ghaze, mɨghsɨaba ko akɨriba ti sɨvaghsɨvagh mangɨ bar gɨvagham,
Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ uabɨ nɨn boriba bar men sure damuam,
Kɨ uan arazir aghuimɨn gɨn mangɨ nɨ damightɨ, nɨ gavgavigham.
Eghtɨ gumazitaba nɨ ko mɨsoghsɨ izɨtɨ, nɨ kamaghɨn fogh suam, kɨ me amadazir puvatɨ.
“Kɨ uabɨ gumazir ainɨn bizibar ingaribar ingarigha, fofozim me ganɨngi.
Eghtɨ mɨsoghamin bizir katam nɨ gasɨghasighan kogham.
